Base theme for govCMS using the UI-Kit

This is a prototype boilerplate to aid the development of a base theme for govCMS using the DTA's UI-kit

In this section

  • What is this prototype?
  • How to use it
  • Base theme vs sub-theme
  • Boilerplate

What is this prototype?

This prototype is part of a govCMS theme and exists as a playground for developing pages and layouts based on the UI-kit.

The package contains:

  • This prototype with associated tooling; and
  • An associated govCMS theme with similar tooling

How to use it

The theme/prototype package can be used to suit your workflow. however, a proposed workflow is:

  1. Install it as a theme within govCMS
  2. Reference the DTA Design Guide & UI-kit to discover the building blocks for prototyping.
  3. Build, test and deploy prototypes within /uikit_base/build
  4. Build, test and deploy the base theme within /uikit_base/*
  5. Create a sub-theme

Base theme vs sub-theme

The theme/prototype base theme uses only the UI-kit.

To create custom themes/prototypes you should create a sub-theme. This is seperate from the base theme and inherits the UI-kit (which supports easy updates).

More information about the sub-theme development is available in README-FIRST.txt in the theme root.

Boilerplate

The UI-kit is not prescriptive with respect to boilerplating but instead provides modular components to permit easy site building.

For example, alternative content page includes a larger global header and a smaller hero block.
